title: Conifer Health Ranked No. 1
text:
[October 13, 2015] Conifer Health Ranked No. 1 
For the third year in a row, Conifer Health Solutions (Conifer Health) earned the top spot as the preferred vendor for 'Hospitals 150 Beds and Greater' according to the 2015 Black Book™ Revenue Cycle Management and Analytics OutsourcingVendors Report . Earlier this year, Conifer Health ranked No. 1 for Financial Services and Software Vendors, Value-Based Care and Accountable Care Organizations (ACO) . 
For both Revenue Cycle Management and Value-Based Care, respondents ranked Conifer Health first in: Vendor overall preference / vertical industry recommendations Reliability Best f breed technology and process improvements "We are excited to earn these first-place industry recognitions, reaffirming Conifer Health's excellence in assisting provider clients to succeed in fee-for-service and evolve to a value-based model," said Stephen M. Mooney, president and CEO of Conifer Health. "Earning this ranking year after year is a tribute to our team members who work diligently to drive client results, including improved operational performance, optimized revenue and management of financial risk." 
Conifer Health's top-rated performance in the Revenue Cycle Management Services report was attributed to payment reform preparations, analytics and business decision support, seamless EHR integration, demonstrated cost savings and return on investment, and improved charge/reimbursement execution and coding. 
About Black Book™ 
Black Book Rankings, a division of Black Book Market Research LLC, provides healthcare IT users, media, investors, analysts, quality-minded vendors, and prospective software system buyers, pharmaceutical manufacturers, and other interested sectors of the clinical technology industry with comprehensive comparison data of the industry's top respected and competitively performing technology vendors. The largest user opinion poll of its kind in healthcare IT, Black Book collects over 400,000 viewpoints on information technology and outsourced services vendor performance annually. For methodology, auditing, resources, comprehensive research and ranking data, see http://blackbookmarketresearch.com . 
About Conifer Health 
Conifer Health is a healthcare services company partnering with more than 800 clients to strengthen their financial and clinical performance. Conifer Health helps organizations transition from volume to value-based care, enhance the consumer and patient healthcare experience and improve quality, cost, and access to healthcare. Annually, Conifer Health manages more than 24 million patient interactions, and more than $26 billion in net patient revenue and $18 billion in medically managed spend. Conifer Health also provides technology and health management services to support care management for more than 5 million lives.
